title: My Cup of Tea
description: Absurd. Unrealistic. No one has a love life like that…at least that’s what I thought.  Mandy is just your average, single twenty-something trying to make life work in the city. Alone and frustrated with life and adulting, Mandy likes to take out her frustrations by serial reviewing books in her free time. In particular, a certain genre of unrealistic romances known as reverse harem.  While everyone around her seems to be busy getting it on, Mandy hasn’t found a single guy worth her time. And, at the ripe old age of her mid-twenties, has learned to settle for the one constant in her life to get her through monotony: her cup of tea.  That is, until she meets them…  HER CUP OF TEA is a short comedic reverse harem contemporary romance.
author: Alice Wilde
